description: This is the ongoing re-occuring project for the Codefellows 301 course. It is a profile page to showcase my coding talents.
This was the final project for the Codefellows 201 course. It is based loosely off of the Steve Jackson Game of Zombie Dice. This was deployed to github pages.

This was the week three project for the Codefellows 201 course. It is a dummy market research app that allows a user to pick the most likely item of three random images they would purchase and then after 25 tries have an option to contintue or display the data which uses chart.js.

This was the week two project for the Codefellows 201 course. It is a dummy store page along with a sales page that displays stats in a table on how well business was for each location. This was deployed to github pages.
